pageTitle: eq:Ice Core :: Wiki :: World of Warcraft :: ZAM
textBeforeTable: Rank Requirements This ability allows you to absorb the pure essence of elemental ice into your soul. While this ability is active, you will take less damage from spells. This ability lasts slightly longer than Heart of Ice (assuming it is not stripped by excess damage) and can absorb more total damage from incoming spells. Magician 623 EverQuest Wikibase™ Type: Active Macro: /alt activate 623 Expansion: The Serpent's Spine Total AA: 36 Cooldown: 00:22:00 Classes: Magician Ice Core Quick Facts eq:Ice Core   Wiki search Recent changes What links here Print this page Main page
